channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Many large deep pot holes, 24th March
item.description:
Various locations along this road. Some are on the edge of the road and unavoidable when passing other vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cockleford Road, Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two deep hot holes near side of road, 24th March
item.description:
What 3 words location is tenure.brains.compelled on B4063

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victory Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface including previous patch repairs is badly deteriorated, 24th March
item.description:
Pot holes on the centre of Harp Hill caused by previous patch repairs have arisen due to large volume of traffic using this road, and are causing constant noise and vibration nuisance to residents on a daily basis.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is dead and now rotting towards private address., 24th March
item.description:
The tree is located outside no 38 Norfolk avenue. The tree didn't grow leafs last year and the trunk is looking more rotten

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Norfolk Avenue, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Possible sink hole, 24th March
item.description:
There appears to be the starts of a sink hole by the kerb opposite the church car park. Unfortunately didn't have my phone to take a picture.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large round deep pothole, 24th March
item.description:
In the road near the bend by the kerbside
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Wordsworth Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot hole around drain, 24th March
item.description:
Ermin way, close to the 12 Bells pub. As you turn into Ermin way off the Cirencester road, just as the road bears to the left by the side of the pub wall there is a pot hole all around the drain cover.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Douro Road between Christchuch Road and Lansdown Parade, 24th March
item.description:
The entire stretch of Douro Road, between Christchuch Road and Lansdown Parade, has potholes and damaged surfacing making it difficult to drive along it. The entire road requires re-surfacing rather than patching.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Douro Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lansdown Terrace Lane, 24th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdown Terrace Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Gordon Lamp broken and not working, 24th March
item.description:
Gordon Lamp broken and not working. One of the globes of this important historic feature, needs repair and the light is not working. This dilapidation does not reflect well at this major gateway to town.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
